title.rendered: Setup Email on an Android  Phone

excerpt.rendered: Setting up your mobile email on your Android device can be done in a few quick steps. First, open the Google Play Store app and search for the Microsoft Outlook email app. Once downloaded, open the app and click on the blue Get Started button. Next, type in the email address for the account that you’ll be using on this device.
